text: Risoku o musaboru mono wa, akuma ni toritsuka rete taoreta mono ga suru yona oki-kata shika dekinaidearou. Sore wa kare-ra ga `shobai wa risoku o toru yona monoda.' To iukaradearu. Shikashi arra wa, shobai o yurushi, risoku (kori) o kinjite ora reru. Sorede omo kara kunkai ga kudatta nochi, tomeru mono wa, kako no koto wa yurusa reyou. Kare no koto wa, arra (no ote no naka) ni aru.Daga (sono hi o) kurikaesu mono wa, goka no junin de, kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumu nodearu
